name: trillian.im web messenger - dark
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
a dark theme for the trillian.im web messenger. screenshot taken with my trillian.im censored user style.
additional_info: change log 2018-06-13 - all urls now also without www. 2018-03-16 - trillian web 6.1 included 2018-02-02 - chat history implemented - chat image history implemented - loading circle image in black implemented - thanks to ajaxload.info for providing this usefull tool. - emoji categories inverted in emjoi browser 2018-01-10 - eula is now also in black, cause in the sign up form is a link to the end user license agreement (eula) 2018-01-05 - style created - screenshots added - upload to userstyles.org - 153783
